Package informationStorage

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BaseActionSharedInformation
    BaseActionSharedInformation.java --- Class for sharing information between all instances or subclasses of BaseAction instances.
    CurrentGameInformation
    CurrentGameInformation.java --- Storage class for all current information of the game.
    DistantRegion
    DistantRegion.java --- A wrapper Class used for encapsulating a single Region.
    InformationStorage
    InformationStorage.java --- Class for storing and distributing all kinds of building, upgrade, etc. information.
    MapInformation
    MapInformation.java --- Class for storing different kinds of map information.
    ResourceReserver
    ResourceReserver.java --- Class that holds any reserved minerals or gases.
    ScienceVesselStorage
    ScienceVesselStorage.java --- Shared storage Class for the FollowActionTerran_ScienceVessel action.
    SiegeTankStorage
    SiegeTankStorage.java --- Shared storage Class for PlayerUnitTerran_SiegeTank instances, mainly due to them needing a storage for already grouped Units.
    UnitMapper
    UnitMapper.java --- Class for mapping two Units together.
    UnitTrackerInformation
    UnitTrackerInformation.java --- Class for storing UnitTrackerModule information.
    WorkerConfiguration
    WorkerConfiguration.java --- Configuration Class for the worker Units.
